import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import {Button, Accordion, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; // import { Accordion } from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Description.css' const Review = ({review, deleteReview, prevPage}) => { const btn = () => { console.log(review); } const deleteBtnClickHandler =(_id) => { axios.delete('http://localhost:8000/reviews/' + _id) .then(res => { deleteReview(_id); alert(`${res.data.title} has been deleted`) }) } return(
